The answer is a list of dictionaries, each one representing a teacher with their respective department, research area and number of projects. The teachers are sorted by the number of projects in descending order. In case of ties, the teachers are sorted alphabetically by surname.

The query used to obtain this result is:
```vbnet
SELECT t.teacher_id, t.name, t.surname, d.department_id, d.department_name, tr.research_area, tr.number_of_project
FROM teachers t
JOIN departments d ON t.department_id = d.department_id
JOIN teacher_research_areas tr ON t.teacher_id = tr.teacher_id
ORDER BY number_of_project DESC, surname ASC;
```
